23#  include <iostream>
24#  include <typeinfo>

33
34#if VSIP_IMPL_DO_COVERAGE
35#  define VSIP_IMPL_COVER_FCN(TYPE, FCN)				\
36  std::cout << "FCN," << TYPE << "," << #FCN << std::endl;
37#else
38#  define VSIP_IMPL_COVER_FCN(TYPE, FCN)
39#endif
40
41#if VSIP_IMPL_DO_COVERAGE
42#  define VSIP_IMPL_COVER_BLK(TYPE, BLK)				\
43     std::cout << "BLK," << TYPE << "," << typeid(BLK).name() << std::endl;
44#else
45#  define VSIP_IMPL_COVER_BLK(TYPE, BLK)
46#endif
47
48#if VSIP_IMPL_DO_COVERAGE
49#  define VSIP_IMPL_COVER_TAG(TYPE, TAG)				\
50     std::cout << "TAG," << TYPE << "," << typeid(TAG).name() << std::endl;
51#else
52#  define VSIP_IMPL_COVER_TAG(TYPE, TAG)
